con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: { "@class": "GradebookCore.GbCategory", "aggregationMetadata": { "@class": "CoreGrading.GradeAggregationMetadata", "aggregationMode": "SUM", "timeAggregationMode": "SUM", "normalScoring": true, "useOwnMarkedTakenIfAggregationFalse": true, "useOwnScoreIfAggregationNull": true, "useOwnTimeIfAggregationNull": true }, "assignments": [ { "@ref": "GradebookCore.GbAssignment", "activityUri": "soa:qa:activity:RUZJYGHD2PMGRCD7P066" }], "childCategories": [], "exclude": true, "extraCredit": true, "required": true, "weight": 0, "categoryUri": "analytics:gb:category:course", "label": "New_4 July", "parentCategory": "" }

con:testCase.name: Gradebook- allStudentCategoryAndAssignmentGrades
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [] located at [/gradebookapi/ajax/gradebook/${#Project#version}/${#TestCase#course_cgi}/${#TestCase#c_info}]

con:config.script:
import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows
def XLPath = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("XLPath")
log.info ("Path : " + XLPath)
Workbook objWB = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(XLPath))
Sheet objSheet = objWB.getSheet(0)
NumOfXLSRows = objSheet.getRows()
log.info ("Number of TZ_Xls rows: " + NumOfXLSRows)
course_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,2).getContents()
c_info = objSheet.getCell(3,2).getContents()
log.info("Course Cgi for: " + course_cgi) log.info("Course specific Information: " + c_info)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("course_cgi", course_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_info", c_info)
//testRunner.runTestStepByName("Course Flat view") objWB.close()

con:configuration.scriptText: log.info(" API_URL: "+ messageExchange.getEndpoint()) log.info(" Timetaken/SLA: "+ messageExchange.getTimeTaken() + " ms")

con:config.script:
import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows
def XLPath = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("XLPath")
log.info ("Path : " + XLPath)
Workbook objWB = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(XLPath))
Sheet objSheet = objWB.getSheet(0)
NumOfXLSRows = objSheet.getRows()
log.info ("Number of TZ_Xls rows: " + NumOfXLSRows)
course_cgi1 = objSheet.getCell(2,12).getContents() c_info = objSheet.getCell(3,12).getContents() studentid1 = objSheet.getCell(4,12).getContents() assignmentid = objSheet.getCell(5,12).getContents() instructorid = objSheet.getCell(6,12).getContents()
log.info("Course Cgi for: " + course_cgi1) log.info("c_info " + c_info) log.info("studentid1 : " + studentid1 ) log.info("assignmentid: " + assignmentid) log.info("instructorid: " + instructorid)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("course_cgi1", course_cgi1) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_info", c_info) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Assignmentid2", assignmentid) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Instructorid2", instructorid) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("studentid", studentid1)
objWB.close()
